sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core

Class ForwardingRegistrable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.ForwardingRegistrable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Registrable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForwardingListener

    public abstract class ForwardingRegistrable
extends com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
implements Registrable
    A registrable which forwards all its method calls to another registrable. Subclasses should override one or more methods to modify the behavior of the backing registrable as desired per the decorator pattern.

    Note that this class does not forward the equals and hashCode methods through to the backing object. See ForwardingObject for more details.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
